name: Chroma Club
description:
Check out Chroma Club ...a cool club where you use your magic markers to do awesome stuff like...

MAGIC MARKERS - You can use cool markers like brick or glass to doodle cool stuff. You can use the magic chroma marker to doodle pets and make them come to life. As you use your markers around the world, you earn experience points that help unlock more awesome powers for your markers :)

DO AWESOME PROJECTS - Use your markers to make cool projects...like stickers, role-play worlds, stories, games, music, videos, and photos. You can work on these projects with other players in the world :)

ENJOY CREATIVE MULTIPLAYER - You can work on other player projects, trade stickers, chat, and collab with others :)

GO ON DOODLE ADVENTURES - Explore the cool and artistic worlds to find hidden magical gel to fill up your markers. Help other characters in the world to unlock new magic markers :)

COLLECT ALL OF THE MAGIC MARKERS, COLORS, AND PROJECT BADGES - Go around the world and help out creatures to collect markers and gel. Finish special projects to win badges :)

INDIE HEART - Chroma Club is a game made by an independent developer. It was built with indie passion and has indie heart.

EMBRACE THE POWER OF THE DOODLE - Check out Chroma Club today :)
